Name: Login
Brief Description: Allows a user to log in to the system
Precondition: User is not logged in to the system.
User has username and password Complete and submit login form
Postcondition: The system displays the work area of the Registered User .
Interruption of the connection to the SMOS server.
Basic flow: Verify that username and password have length >=5. If the condition is met go to step two, otherwise notify the user of the error.
Search the archive to see if the username and password entered by the user are among the loggable users
If the search is successful, the user is logged into the system

Name: LoginError
Brief Description: Occurs when the user has entered incorrect authentication data.
Precondition: Data provided for login is incorrect
Postcondition: The user can try logging in again
Basic flow: View the login form

Name: Logout
Brief Description: Allows a user to exit the system
Precondition: User is logged in to the system .
Click on the logout button
Postcondition: The user can log back into the system
Basic flow: View the login form

Name: EditPassword
Brief Description: Allows a user to change their password
Precondition: User is logged in to the system .
Click on the "Change Password" button
Postcondition: The user's password has been changed.
The user cancels the operation Interruption of the connection to the SMOS server
Basic flow: Fill out the form and submit;
View the form with the fields: old password, new password, confirm new password.
Confirm that the password has been changed

Name: ViewElistUsers
Brief Description: View the list of users in the system
Precondition: User is logged in as administrator .
User clicks on the "User Management" button
Postcondition: The system displays the list of users in the system .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Search for users in the archive.
display a list of them

Name: NewUser
Brief Description: Entering a new user into the system
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the use case "ViewUser List".
the system is displaying the list of users in the system .
The user clicks on the "New User" button
Postcondition: A new user has been created Data error is notified Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Fill in the fields of the form.
Click on the "Save" button
View the user entry form consisting of the following fields: First Name, Last Name, e-mail, cell, login, password, password confirmation.
Performs checks on the validity of the entered data and enters the new user into the archive; in case the entered data is invalid, activates the use case "ErrorData"

Name: ViewDetailsUser
Brief Description: View a user's details
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewListUsers".
The system is displaying the list of users in the system.
The user clicks on the "Details" button
Postcondition: The system displays detailed information about a user.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Displays the user's detailed information and in particular: First name, Last name, e-mail, cell, login, password.

Name: EditUser
Brief Description: Changing one or more data regarding a user in the system
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the "ViewUserDetails" use case.
The system is Viewing a user's details .
The user modifies one or more pieces of information contained in the form of Display of user details.
Postcondition: User has been changed Data error is notified Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Click on the "edit" button
Performs checks on the validity of the entered data and edits the user; in case the entered data is invalid, activates the use case "ErrorData"

Name: DeleteUser
Brief Description: Delete a user from the system
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the use case "ViewUserDetails".
The system is Viewing a user's details .
The user clicks on the "Delete" button
Postcondition: User has been deleted .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Delete user from the archive
View updated user list

Name: Assign/RemoveRolesToA User
Brief Description: Allows you to assign or remove roles to a user
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the "ViewUserDetails" use case.
The system is Viewing a user's details .
The user clicks on the "User Roles" button.
Postcondition: User roles are changed Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Selects the roles to be assigned or removed to the user
Click on the "Submit" button
View the role management form
Assigns or removes user roles as directed by the Administrator

Name: Assign/RemoveTeachingToAtUnTeacher.
Brief Description: Allows you to assign or remove teaching to a teacher
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the "ViewUserDetails" use case.
The system is Viewing a teacher's details .
The user clicks on the "Teacher Teachings" button.
Postcondition: One or more teacher teachings have been assigned or removed Administrator aborts Operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select the academic year
Select the desired class
Select the teachings to be associated with or removed from the teacher
View the teaching management form for the teacher in question
View the list of available classes for the selected year
View the list of teachings associated with that class
Assigns or removes teacher teachings as directed by the Administrator

Name: Assign/RemoveStudentsToA Parent
Brief Description: Allows you to associate new students with a parent or remove previously entered associations
Precondition: The user is logged in as administrator .
The user has performed the "ViewUserDetails" use case.
The system is Viewing the details of a parent .
The user clicks on the "Parenting" button.
Postcondition: One or more children have been associated with or removed from a parent.
Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Selecting students to assign or remove to parent
Click on the "Submit" button
View the child management form for the parent in question
Assigns/Removes students associated with a Parent

Name: ViewListClasses
Brief Description: Allows you to view the list of classes
Precondition: User is logged in to the system with the role of Administrator .
User clicks on the "Manage Classes" button
Postcondition: The system shows the list of classes for the selected academic year.
The Administrator stops the operations.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Select the academic year of interest.
Allows you to select the academic year whose class list you want to view.
Search for classes in the archive and display the class management screen
View the list of classes for the selected academic year.

Name: InsertNewClass
Brief Description: Inserts a new class into the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as an Administrator .
The user has already run the use case "ViewListClasses".
The system Is viewing the list of classes for a particular academic year.
The 'user clicks on the "New Class" button.
Postcondition: User has entered a class into the system Data error is notified Connection to SMOS server aborted Administrator aborts operation
Basic flow: Fill out the form.
Click on the "Save" button
The system shows the form to fill out with: name, address, academic year.
It performs checks on the validity of the entered data and inserts the new class into the archive; in case the entered data is invalid, it activates the "ErrorData" use case.

Name: ViewDetailsClass
Brief Description: Allows you to view the details of a class
Precondition: The user has already logged in .
The user has already run the use case "ViewListClasses".
The system Is viewing the list of classes for an academic year .
Click on the "show class details" button
Postcondition: The user displays detailed information about a class.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: View fencing with details of an individual class: name, address, school year.

Name: DeleteClass
Brief Description: Delete a class from the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has run the use case "ViewClassDetails".
The user displays the detailed information of a class.
The user Clicks on the "Delete" button
Postcondition: User deleted a class .
Connection to SMOS server broken
Basic flow: Delete the class from the archive
View updated class list

Name: ViewListAddresses
Brief Description: Allows you to view the list of Addresses
Precondition: User is logged in to the system with the role of Administrator .
User clicks on the "Manage Addresses" button
Postcondition: The system shows the list of addresses in the archive .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: View the list of addresses.

Name: EnterNewAddress
Brief Description: Inserts a new address into the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has already run the use case "ViewListAddresses".
The system is displaying the address list.
The user clicks on the "New Address" button
Postcondition: User entered an address Data error is notified Connection to SMOS server aborted Administrator aborts operation
Basic flow: Fill out the form.
Click on the "Save" button
The system shows the form to be filled out with: name address.
It performs checks on the validity of the entered data and inserts a new address into the archive; in case the entered data is invalid, it activates the "ErrorData" use case.

Name: ViewDetailsAddress
Brief Description: Allows you to view the details of an address
Precondition: The user has already logged in.
The user has already run the use case "ViewListAddresses".
The system is displaying the address list.
The user clicks on the "show address details" button
Postcondition: The user displays detailed information about an individual address.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Displays the screen with details of an individual address; specifically :address name.

Name: DeleteAddress
Brief Description: Delete an address from the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has run the use case "ViewDetailsAddress".
The user displays the detailed information of an address.
The user clicks on the "Delete" button
Postcondition: User deleted an address .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Checks whether the address has associated classes; if so, it shows an error message "Unable to delete address, delete associated classes and try again," otherwise delete the address.
View updated address list

Name: AssignRemoveInsignments
Brief Description: Assigns or removes one or more teachings from an address
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has run the use case "ViewDetailsAddress".
The user views the detailed information of an address.
The user clicks on the button "Address Teachings"
Postcondition: Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
The system has changed the teachings related to the address
Basic flow: Select the teachings to be assigned or removed to the address
Click on the "Submit" button
Displays a form from which teachings can be added and/or removed at the address.
Associates or removes selected teachings to the address.
Return to the address details display.

Name: ViewListInsights
Brief Description: Allows you to view the list of teachings
Precondition: User is logged in to the system with the role of Administrator .
User clicks on the "Manage Teachings" button
Postcondition: The system shows the list of teachings in the archive.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Search for teachings in the archive and access the teachings screen.
View the list of teachings through teaching management.

Name: InsertNewTeaching
Brief Description: Inserts a new teaching into the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has already run the use case "ViewElencoTeaching".
The system is displaying the list of teachings.
The user clicks on the "New Teaching" button
Postcondition: User entered a teaching Error is notified Connection to SMOS server aborted Administrator aborts operation
Basic flow: Fill out the form.
Click on the "Save" button
The system shows the form to be filled in with: teaching name.
It performs checks on the validity of the entered data and enters the new teaching into the archive; in case the entered data is invalid, it activates the "ErrorData" use case.

Name: ViewDetailsTeaching
Brief Description: Allows you to view the details of a teaching
Precondition: The user has already logged in .
The user has already run the use case "ViewListInsights".
The system is displaying the list of teachings .
User clicks on the "teaching details" button
Postcondition: User displays detailed information of an individual teaching .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: View the screen with details of an individual teaching.

Name: EditTeaching
Brief Description: Editing details of a teaching
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as an Administrator .
The user has run the use case "ViewTeachingDetails" .
The user views the detailed information of a teaching .
The user modifies any of the information in the form of display of teaching details
Postcondition: User changed a teaching Data error is notified Connection to SMOS server aborted Administrator aborts operation
Basic flow: Click the "Save" button
It performs checks on the validity of the entered data and modifies the teaching in the archive; in case the entered data is invalid, it activates the "ErrorData" use case.
View the updated teaching list

Name: DeleteTeaching
Brief Description: Delete a teaching from the archive
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has run the use case "ViewTeachingDetails".
The user views the detailed information of a teaching.
The user clicks on the "Delete" button
Postcondition: User deleted a teaching .
Connection to SMOS server broken
Basic flow: Delete teaching from the archive
View the updated teaching list

Name: ViewListRecords
Brief Description: View the list of records for an academic year
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as Administrator .
Click on the "Digital Registry" button
Postcondition: System is displaying the list of records referring to a particular academic year Administrator aborts Operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select school year
Shows a screen for selecting the academic year of interest.
Search the archive for all digital records for that year and display them associated with the class to which they belong.

Name: ViewDetailsSingleRegister
Brief Description: View details of one of the class registers
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user must have performed the use case "ViewListRecords"
Click on the "Details" button associated with one of the records.
Postcondition: The system is displaying details of a class register .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Displays on the screen the information contained in the register organized by date.
In particular it shows, for today's date, the list of pupils, specifying: absent/present, late entries and a form from which you can manage justifications and disciplinary notes.

Name: InsertAbsencesAdmin
Brief Description: Digitization of the Registry, data entry by the Administrator
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
Select the date on which they want to enter the information.
Postcondition: Absence and tardiness data have been entered into the system.
The system has sent notifications to parents.
The system remains on the register screen.
Administrator aborts operation.
Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Fill out the form by entering absent/present students and click "Save"
Update the displayed screen by date
Sends the data to the server.
The server for each absence sends an e-mail notification to the student's parent.
View updated registry data.

Name: InsertDelayAdmin
Brief Description: Digitization of the Registry, data entry by the Administrator
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
Select the date on which they want to enter the information.
Postcondition: Late data has been entered into the system.
The system has sent notifications to parents.
The system remains on the register screen.
Administrator aborts operation.
Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Fill out the form by entering students with tardiness and click "Save"
Update the displayed screen by date
Sends the data to the server.
View updated registry data.

Name: EditAbsence
Brief Description: Editing of absences by the Administrator. Editing is intended as inserting/deleting the absence.
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
Select the date on which they wish to edit an absence
Postcondition: The system changed the selected absence and sent parents a notification of the change.
The system remains on the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Edit the absence (Insert or Delete) and click "Save"
Refresh the screen based on the selected date
Sends the changed data to the server.
The system sends a correction e-mail to the parent of the student.

Name: EditDelay
Brief Description: modification of a delay by the Administrator
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
Select the date on which they wish to change the delay
Postcondition: The system changed the delays to the date entered.
The system remains on the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: The user edits the delay and clicks "Save"
Refresh the screen based on the selected date
The system sends the changed data to the server .

Name: EliminateDelay
Brief Description: Elimination of a delay by the Administrator.
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
Select the date on which you wish to delete a delay.
Postcondition: The system has eliminated the delay.
The system remains on the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Delete a student's late entry and click "Save"
Refresh the screen based on the selected date
Eliminates late entry from the archive.

Name: ViewListAbout
Brief Description: View the list of justifications
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as Administrator
User has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister"
Click the "Justifications" button related to a student
Postcondition: System is displaying the list of justifications inherent to the student Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Shows all the student's absences recorded during the selected school year; excused absences are displayed in green, while those to be excused are displayed in red.

Name: ViewListNotes
Brief Description: View the list of notes inherent to the student
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as Administrator
User has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister"
Click on the "Notes" button associated with a student
Postcondition: System is displaying the list of notes referred to the student Administrator aborts Operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Shows all of the student's notes recorded during the school year

Name: InsertExplanation
Brief Description: Entry Justifies
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewSingleRegisterDetails".
The user has performed the use case "ViewListExcuses".
The user clicks on one of the absences in red
Postcondition: The justification data has been entered into the system.
The system returns to the register screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Fill out the form.
Click "Save"
Shows a form in which to enter justification fields (justification date).
Save the justification.

Name: InsertNote
Brief Description: Entering Disciplinary Notes
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsSingleRegister".
The user has already performed the use case "ViewListNote".
The user clicks on the "New Note" button
Postcondition: The note data has been entered into the system.
The system has sent the notification to parents.
The system returns to the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Fill out the form.
Click "Save"
Shows a form with note fields (student, date, teacher , description).
Save the note and send an email notification to the parent

Name: ViewDetailsJustify
Brief Description: View the details of a justification
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewElect List"
Click on one of the absences in green
Postcondition: The system is displaying the details of a justification.
Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Shows a form with justification details.
The ability to edit or delete the justification.

Name: ViewDetailsNote
Brief Description: View the details of a note
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewListNotes"
Click on the "details" button associated with one of the notes
Postcondition: The system is displaying the details of a note.
Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Shows a form with details of the note: student, description, teacher, date.

Name: EditJustification
Brief Description: Editing a Justification
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as an Administrator .
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsJustify".
The system is viewing the details of a justification
Postcondition: The justification has been changed.
The system returns to the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted.
Basic flow: Edit one or more fields of the displayed form: date justifies.
Click on "Save"
Edit justification.

Name: EditNote
Brief Description: Modification of a Disciplinary Note
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as Administrator .
User has performed the use case "ViewDetailsNote"
Postcondition: The note data has been changed.
The system returns to the register screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: The user edits one or more fields in the displayed form: Student, description, teacher, date.
The user clicks "Save"
The system saves the changes

Name: EliminateJustify
Brief Description: Delete Justify
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as an Administrator .
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsJustify".
The system is displaying the details of a justification.
Click on "Delete"
Postcondition: The justification has been deleted from the system.
The system returns to the log screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Eliminate justification.

Name: DeleteNote
Brief Description: Elimination of Disciplinary Notes
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as Administrator .
The user has performed the use case "ViewDetailsNote".
The system is viewing.
The details of a note .
The user clicks the "Delete" button
Postcondition: The note was deleted.
The system sent the notification to the parents.
The system returns to the registry screen.
Administrator aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: The system sends an errata notification to the student's parents, then deletes the note data from the file.

Name: MakeMonitoringStudents
Brief Description: Allows you to query the system about the number of absences and notes associated with students
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as an administrator .
The user clicks on the "Student Monitoring" button
Postcondition: : Has been information about pupils' absences and notes.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted.
Basic flow: Search the archive for students who have, for the current school year a number of absences and notes above a predetermined threshold.
Displays a screen presenting the data obtained.

Name: ViewOnePagella
Brief Description: Viewing a report card
Precondition: User has logged in to the system as Administrator .
User clicks on the "Online report cards" button
Postcondition: System displays a student's report card.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select the academic year
Selects the class of the student whose report card you want to view
Select the student.
The quarter whose report card to view by clicking on the appropriate button.
Displays the list of classes in the system with a "Report Cards" button associated with each class next to it
Displays the list of pupils in the class chosen by the user
View the selected student's report card referring to the selected quarter.

Name: EntryPage
Brief Description: Entering a student's report card performed by the Administrator
Precondition: User has logged in to the system as Administrator .
User clicks on the "Online report cards" button
Postcondition: A report card related to a student has been added to the system.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Selects the class of the pupil whose report card is to be entered
Select the student to enter the report card for by clicking on the relevant button
Enters report card grades, all or in part, and clicks the "save" button
Displays the list of classes in the system referring to the current academic year with a "Report Cards" button associated with each class next to it
Displays the list of pupils in the class chosen by the user
View the form for entering a report card
Inserts grades entered into the archive and returns the user to the class student viewing page.

Name: EditOfOnePage
Brief Description: Use case for editing a student's report card
Precondition: The user has logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "ViewOfAPage ".
The user clicks on the edit button
Postcondition: A report card related to a pupil is changed.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Enter the new data and click the confirmation button
View form with fields you can edit including grades for different subjects
The system displays a confirmation message and displays the form with the list of pupils

Name: DeleteOfOnePage
Brief Description: Administrator deletes a report card from the system
Precondition: The user has logged in to the system as Administrator.
The user has performed the use case "Viewing a report card".
The user clicks on the "delete" button
Postcondition: A report card related to a student is deleted .
Connection to the SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: The user accepts the deletion by pressing the confirmation key
The system displays a form to confirm the deletion
Displays a message of successful deletion and displays the form with the list of classes

Name: ViewRequestsSubscription
Brief Description: Allows the administrator to view the list of applications that have arrived at the system
Precondition: User is logged into the system as an administrator .
User clicks on the "View Enrollment Request List" button featured in the home
Postcondition: User is viewing the list of student applications to the system.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: View the list of enrollments yet to be activated.

Name: AcceptSubscriptionStudent
Brief Description: Allows the administrator to accept a student's enrollment in the system
Precondition: User has already performed the "View Enrollment Requests" use case.
User clicks on the "Accept" button associated with an enrollment request
Postcondition: User accepted a request to enroll in the system.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Activates the new user in the system.
View the list of enrollments yet to be activated

Name: RejectSubscriptionStudent
Brief Description: Allows the administrator to reject a student's enrollment in the system
Precondition: User has already performed the "View Enrollment Requests" use case.
User clicks on the "Reject" button associated with an enrollment request
Postcondition: User rejected a request to enroll in the system.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Deletes the application to the system.
View the list of enrollments yet to be activated

Name: Search Entity
Brief Description: Allows the administrator to search the system for all entities characterized by the keywords entered
Precondition: User is logged in to the system as an admin .
User enters the text to be searched and clicks on the "Search" button
Postcondition: The user is viewing an active list of entities corresponding to the keywords entered.
User aborts operation .
Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Displays the list of entities related to the keywords searched; specifically shown in an active list are: Classes, Teachings, Addresses, Users found.

Name: ViewListClasses
Brief Description: Visualization of classes
Precondition: The user must be logged into the system as ATA staff
Postcondition: The user is shown a list from which to choose the class.
Basic flow: The system shows the user a screen with all the classes in the database, with a button to access the register for each class.

Name: InsertAbsences
Brief Description: Digitization of the registry, data collection from ATA staff class by class.
Precondition: The user must be logged in to the system as ATA staff.
The user has performed the use case ViewListClassroomsATA.
Select a class whose data is to be entered into the system
Postcondition: Absence data has been entered into the system.
The system has sent notifications to parents.
The user is shown the home screen again.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted.
The user aborts the operation.
Basic flow: User selects absent students.
Click save
Shows the user a screen with pupils and radio buttons to select whether a pupil is absent or present.
By default the pupil is present.
The system sends the data to the server.
The server for each absence sends an e.
mail notification to the student's parent.

Name: InsertDelayAta
Brief Description: Digitization of the registry, data collection from ATA staff class by class.
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as ATA staff.
User has performed the use case ViewListClassroomsATA.
Select a class whose data is to be entered into the system
Postcondition: Delay data has been entered into the system.
The user is shown the home screen again.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted.
The user stops operations.
Basic flow: User selects delays.
User clicks "Confirm"
The system shows the user a screen with all pupils present, with a "late" checkbox next to it.
If selected, select fields are activated on the side to select the time of the delay
The system sends the data to the server.

Name: ViewClassListDoctor
Brief Description: This use case allows a teacher to view the list of classes in which he or she teaches
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as a teacher .
The 'user clicks the "Digital Register" button
Postcondition: The list of all classes in which the teacher teaches was shown .
Connection to SMOS server broken.
Basic flow: Select the academic year of interest.
View the list of academic years in which there is at least one class in which the lecturer teaches.
View the classes associated with the selected school year.

Name: ViewRegister
Brief Description: Viewing the class register
Precondition: The user is logged in to the system as a teacher .
The user has performed the use case "ViewListClasses".
The system is displaying the list of all the classes in which he/she teaches .
The user clicks on the "Register" button associated with one of the classes
Postcondition: : Class register information was shown .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted.
Basic flow: Displays information related to the class register and in particular:Date, Absences, Disciplinary Notes, Tardies and Justifications.

Name: DisplayOfAPagellaLecturer
Brief Description: Viewing a report card
Precondition: User has logged into the system as a Teacher .
User clicks on the "Online Report Cards" button
Postcondition: System displays a student's report card.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select the academic year of interest.
Select one of the displayed classes.
Select the student whose report card and four-month reference period to view by clicking on the appropriate button.
View the list of academic years in which there is at least one class in which the lecturer teaches.
View the classes associated with the selected school year.
Displays the list of pupils in the class chosen by the user
View the selected student's report card referring to the specified four-month period.

Name: DisplayOfAStudentPage
Brief Description: The report card of the student requesting it is displayed
Precondition: User has logged into the system as a Student .
User clicks on "online report card"
Postcondition: The system displays a student's report card .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Select the report card of interest
The system displays the logged-in student's report cards on file
View details of selected report card

Name: ViewScholasticDataStudent
Brief Description: Display of school information about the user
Precondition: User is logged into the system as a student .
User clicks the "Digital Registry" button
Postcondition: Class register data related to the student was shown .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Search the archive for data related to the register of the class to which the student belongs
View data related to the student and in particular: Date, Absences, Disciplinary Notes, Tardiness and Justifications.

Name: ViewStudentData
Brief Description: This use case allows a parent to view information about their children's
Precondition: User is logged into the system as a parent .
'User clicks the "Register" button associated with one of his or her children
Postcondition: Information about one of the user''s children was shown.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Displays a summary table with information about the children and in particular:Date, Absences, Disciplinary Notes, Tardiness and Justifications.

Name: ViewOnePagella
Brief Description: The required student's report card is displayed
Precondition: User has logged into the system as a Parent.
User clicks on the report card button associated with one of their children
Postcondition: System displays a student's report card.
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Select the report card of interest
View selected student's report cards
View details of selected report card

Name: MakeMonitoringStudents
Brief Description: Allows students with a number of notes and absences above a user-specified threshold to be displayed
Precondition: User is logged in to the system as management.
'User clicks on the "Student Monitoring" button
Postcondition: Information pertaining to collected data was displayed .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted.
Basic flow: Look for students with a number of absences and notes above the established threshold.
View retrieved information.

Name: ViewListRecords
Brief Description: View the list of records for an academic year
Precondition: User must be logged in to the system as Management .
'User clicks on the "Digital Registry" button
Postcondition: System is displaying the list of records referring to a particular academic year Management aborts Operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select the academic year
Shows a screen for selecting the academic year of interest.
Search the archive for all digital records for that year and display them associated with the class to which they belong

Name: ViewRegister
Brief Description: Details related to the register of a class
Precondition: The user is logged in to the direction system.
The user has performed the "ViewListRegisters" use case.
The system is displaying the list of all registers for a particular academic year.
The user clicks the "Register" button associated with one of the classes
Postcondition: Class register information was shown .
Connection to SMOS server interrupted
Basic flow: Displays on the screen the information contained in the register organized by date.
In particular it shows, for the selected date the list of pupils, specifying: absent/present, late entries and a form from which you can manage justifications and disciplinary notes.

Name: ViewOnePagella
Brief Description: Viewing a report card
Precondition: User has logged into the system as a Directorate .
User clicks on the "Online Report Cards" button
Postcondition: System displays a student's report card.
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Select the academic year
Selects the class of the student whose report card you want to view.
Select the student whose report card and quarter of interest you wish to view by clicking on the relevant button
Displays the list of classes in the system with a "Report Cards" button associated with each class next to it
Displays the list of pupils in the class chosen by the user
Displays the selected student's report card referring to the selected semester.

Name: RegistrationAlSite
Brief Description: Allows a student to register with the system
Precondition: The user clicks on the "Register" button on the home page
Postcondition: User has made request for system enrollment
User aborts operation Connection to SMOS server aborted
Basic flow: Fills in the fields of the form
Submits the form
View the registration form containing: First name, Last name, Mobile phone, e-mail, username, password, password confirmation.
Enters the application into the system
